title: Udyr Masteries
body:
I have a serious doubt on which masteries can I use with {{champion:77}} in the jungle... 
My options are very specific :-
1) Thunderlord's Decree
2) Fervor of Battle

According to my calculations Fervor should deal 140 extra damage in 10 autos, but Thunderlord's and deal 30% AD + 10% AP in only 3 basic attacks, but it goes for cooldown after that.

It would be great help if you'd answer the pole below!

replies.body: Strength of the Ages > Fervour > Thunderlord's.
Ah! Now its damn fun to play {{champion:77}}! At first I thought it would be a waste to et 300 extra hp but then the second line caught my attention! It'll be just great for team fights and all! Ty!
there are many ways people can look at this, i would say go with Fervor if you run Blue/Red Smite with Dev, but if you are going tanky/ap udyr then thunderlords might be better in those cases

Tanky > Damage on Jungle Udyr.

I would personally Run Strength of Ages.

For those 2 specific choices. Fervor for Tiger Udyr. Thunderlords for Phoenix.
